Okay, this is what happens when two minds try to make a Dwarven Defender build in the limited lvl 20 environment. Not much room for altering things heh.

I will post this not because my build is quite different-it is not (just a tad more offensive), but because normally one can't find anymore the old ECB pre-epic archive online and i feel we should have at least one DD build here.

In honour of Kail's build i will name mine similar, like it is a twin-but not quite

posts.content:
Here is Kail's old build:


Spoiler

[+]



I must resist the urge... I will be banned if I don't stop.... no.. noooo! *will save failed* (no surprise, look at the stats )

I wanted to build a real defender, trained in the art of protecting his homeland. I said to myself, I'm gonna need battle prowess (fighter), resiliency (dwarf), the capacity to stand one's ground (DwD) and commando skills (rogue) to prepare the battle field (trap skills), use whatever equipment is available (UMD) and hit where it hurts (SA). This is the result and I must say I'm quite satisfied with it. The keeper of the Gate is what you want to stand between you and the savage world beyond.
